rules_text: When this creature enters, create a red Subroutine enchantment token named BOOST() with “Whenever this Subroutine runs, add {R}.” [i](Insert it into one of your three programs. At your first main phase each turn, the next program runs all its Subroutines.)[/i]
notes:
!tokens BOOST() ERR;Program A ERR;Program B ERR;Program C ERR!

art4
concern (power)
